name: Night Shift (itch) (velano)
description:
This game is a stealth game which sacrifices your HP every time you use the flashlight or glowstick. Your goal is to escape through the elevator at the bottom of the drilling station area. Above is a map of the game to help if you are ever stuck.

This was a first time game jam for most of us. As you will see, the game is nowhere near complete. However, we still hope to get some feedback from everyone :).

Controls:

Tasks are indicated with a yellow glow, - HOLD E - to do the task.

SHIFT -  walk making the player quieter (the bug enemy reacts to sound) and slower.

WASD/ARROW KEYS - Movement

LEFT CLICK -  Toggle Flashlight

RIGHT CLICK - Throw glowstick to distract  boss/bug enemy

Time is running out for submission, and the game doesn't seem to be loading on the webpage for us. If you are still interested in playing our game, we have attached a zip file for windows.
